content.text: From October 6-7, 2025, the elizaOS/eliza repository showed moderate activity with 7 new pull requests opened, though none were merged during this period. There were no new issues created. The repository had 3 active contributors participating during this timeframe.
PR #6036 by @0xbbjoker titled 'feat: migrate to UUID-only agent identification' is merged.
PR #6037 by @standujar titled 'feat(core): add config and plugin modules - phase 4 - refactor ElizaOS/Server' is merged.
PR #6040 by @standujar titled 'fix: agent plugins not reloading on PATCH update and service stop race condition' is merged.
PR #6035 by @0xbbjoker titled 'fix(plugins): use correct ZodError.issues API instead of .errors' is merged.
PR #6039 by @standujar titled 'fix(task): ensure runtime database is initialized before task access' is merged.
The repository elizaOS/eliza has a list of top contributors, though specific contributor details are not provided in the input.
